timeline.title: Project Initiation
timeline.description: Started research and initial concept development

timeline.title: CAD Design Phase
timeline.description: Began detailed CAD modeling of the mechanical structure

timeline.title: Slip Ring Design
timeline.description: Design and simulation of custom slip ring system for power delivery

timeline.title: PCB Design
timeline.description: Started designing the main control PCB and LED driver circuits

timeline.title: First Prototype Assembly
timeline.description: Assembly of mechanical components and initial testing

timeline.title: Motor Control System
timeline.description: Implementation of precise motor control and timing system

timeline.title: Sensor Selection
timeline.description: Testing and selection of MEMS gyroscope sensors

timeline.title: First Prototype Design
timeline.description: 3D modeling of pen housing and mechanical components

timeline.title: Project Launch
timeline.description: Initial project setup and architecture planning

timeline.title: Core Algorithm Implementation
timeline.description: Development of graph theory algorithms in Rust

timeline.title: WebGL Visualization
timeline.description: Implementation of 3D graph visualization using Three.js

timeline.title: Beta Testing
timeline.description: Initial release for testing and feedback
